casebody.data:
[Belknap,

June, 1891.] Winnipiseogee Lake Cotton and Woollen Mfg. Co. v. Gilford. Three appeals from the refusal of selectmen to abate taxes. E. A. & C. B. Hibbard and D. Barnard, for the plaintiffs. Jewell & Stone and S. C. Clark, for the defendants. Doe, C. J.

The reserved case presents no question of law.

Case discharged.

Allen, J., did not sit: the others concurred.
